title: The Chances of Natesville
description: A simple family is surprised when their son returns home with a baby whose mother was a (now dead) serial killer. How will they raise a baby when they can barely keep themselves alive?
quote: I don’t know why people wait for their toast to come out to butter it.
altHero: an overwhelmed young man with a baby in his arms
alt1: an unkempt house with junk outside and a Santa decoration on the roof
alt3: a grandma in her brassiere eats pickles out of the jar
alt4: a man holding butter and a knife looks at a toaster
